split_at

Source: R/split-at.R
split_at.Rd

Split vector

Usage

split_at(x, pos)

Arguments

x

vector with positions to split.

Value

list

Details

Split vector at position(s). Returns a list with all elements before and after the split position.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
set.seed(42)
x <- sample(x = 1:10, size = 5)
split_at(x = x, pos = 3)
} # }
